, otherwise known as Paradise Island, is just 2 miles by 0.3 miles in size, off the coast of

. Santa Carolina is a true rock island with deep channels. Santa Carolina has three beautiful beaches with coral reefs close to the shore. Santa Carolina forms part of the Bazaruto Archipelago. The closest mainland town to Santa carolina is Inhassoro which a tourim town with much to offer.
The TV programme Survivor South Africa has been filmed on Santa Carolina Island. Survivor SA will be shown on DSTV from the 20th of January 2010 on MNet at 1930hrs.

Currently no accommodation exisits on Santa Carolina or Paradise Island as it is sometimes known. There are plans to create a new resort on the island in the near future. Bazaruto island has two resorts
which can be contacted in Mozambique +258 84 8856788 or
info@bazaruto.org. Inhassoro is the closest mainland town with more affordable accommodation. The local tourist information centre can be contacted at +258 848856788 or
